title: Joan Miro 2024 Mini Wall Calendar
description:
His work has been interpreted as Surrealism, a sandbox for the subconscious mind, a re-creation of the childlike, and a manifestation of Catalan pride. By any measure the Spanish artist Joan Miro had a monumental impact on 20th century art and his striking body of work continues to influence artists throughout the world. Enjoy 12 of his greatest paintings in this full featured wall calendar.

  • Dimensions: 7 x 7 in.
  • Includes major international holidays, lunar phases, and zodiac signs
  • Features 7 languages: Italian, English, German, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Japanese
